summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activities of Southern Financial LLC for the period of December 1, 2017, to December 31, 2017. It includes information on account balances, transactions, portfolio holdings, and investment performance. This document contains a detailed financial record of portfolio holdings for Southern Financial LLC, including various securities, their market values, realized gains and losses, and other financial metrics for the period of December 1, 2017, to December 31, 2017. It outlines the performance of different asset classes and provides insights into the financial activities related to the account. This document contains a detailed financial record from Deutsche Bank for Southern Financial LLC, covering transactions from December 1, 2017, to December 31, 2017. It includes information on securities bought and sold, dividends received, and other financial activities, highlighting significant monetary movements and investment activities during the specified period. This document contains financial transactions and disclosures related to Southern Financial LLC, detailing various cash withdrawals, deposits, dividends, and interest received during December 2017. It outlines the role of Pershing as a clearing broker and includes important information regarding account management and arbitration agreements. This document contains financial records for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activities, portfolio holdings, and income and expense summaries for the period of November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017. It includes information on cash deposits, withdrawals, securities transactions, and various financial instruments held in the portfolio. This document contains detailed financial information regarding portfolio holdings, including equities, mutual funds, and exchange-traded products, for a specified period. It outlines realized gains and losses from various transactions, providing insights into the financial activities and investment strategies employed. This document contains financial transaction records from Deutsche Bank for the period of November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017, detailing various securities bought and sold, dividends received, and cash withdrawals. It includes information on the cost basis for tax reporting and the performance of different securities. This document contains financial account information for Southern Financial LLC, detailing account activity, income, expenses, and portfolio holdings for the period of October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It includes summaries of gains and losses, as well as disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker. This document contains detailed financial information regarding portfolio holdings, including equities, options, and mutual funds associated with Southern Financial LLC. It outlines various securities, their acquisition dates, market values, and estimated annual income yields, indicating the financial activities and positions held by the entity. This document contains a detailed schedule of realized gains and losses for various securities transactions conducted by an account holder during October 2017. It includes information on securities bought and sold, dividends received, and interest accrued, along with notes on tax reporting and cost basis adjustments. It includes information on various securities, bonds, and equities, as well as disclosures regarding the roles of financial institutions involved. This document contains detailed financial information regarding portfolio holdings, including equities, options, and mutual funds. It outlines the cost basis reporting rules and provides insights into the financial activities of the entity, including securities bought and sold, as well as dividends and interest accrued. This document contains financial transaction records for Southern Financial LLC from September 1, 2017, to September 30, 2017, detailing various securities transactions, dividends, and interest received. It also includes important disclosures regarding the role of Pershing LLC as a clearing broker and the terms and conditions governing transactions. The document emphasizes the importance of consulting a tax advisor for accurate tax return preparation. This document contains financial disclosures and transaction summaries for Southern Financial LLC for the period of August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017. It outlines the roles of these financial institutions in managing the account and includes important arbitration disclosures. This document contains detailed portfolio holdings for Southern Financial LLC, including various equities, their acquisition dates, market values, and estimated annual income yields. This document contains financial transaction details for Southern Financial LLC, including realized gains and losses, dividends, and fees for the period of January 1, 2017, to January 31, 2017. It outlines various securities transactions, including purchases and sales, as well as important disclosures regarding account management and arbitration agreements.
